Conner Hunihan

Visit the Science & Innovation Hub https://sih.berkeley.edu/

Share knowledge, build community

As a Graduate Student Researcher working with the Fung Institute for Engineering Leadership, I managed a NSF-funded project to build a publishing platform for the Science of Science and Innovation Policy (SciSIP) program. Content included over 150 profiles, papers, datasets, and multimedia funded by the SciSIP program over the past five years.

Client

National Science Foundation

Duration

16 weeks

Team

Conner Hunihan
Product Manager, UX Design
 Kathy Lee
Researcher, Project Manager
Lee Fleming
Director, Fung Institute for Engineering Leadership
MIGHTYminnow
Web Design Agency

Personal Skills

Wireframing
Product Management
Creative Direction

EMAIL / TYPEFORM SURVEY / GOOGLE DRIVE

All three used to reach out to Principle Investigators and automate the process of uploading content to a website backend database.

EARLY WIREFRAMES OF INITIAL WEBSITE CONTENT

Used to prototype with PIs to prioritize most critical features: Aboutt Program + Research + project artefacts + PI profiles.

Initial site information architecture

Iterations on the Site's Visual Design from Mighty minnow

FIRST FUNCTIONAL PROTOTYPE DEVELOPED BY MIGHTY MINNOW

FINAL SITE LAUNCHED IN FALL 2018
